snippet: Syfy’s “Beast of the Bering Sea” brings back one of the stars of “Sharknado,” Cassie Scerbo.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television show Beast of the Bering Sea on Syfy channel.
lead_paragraph: Syfy’s “Beast of the Bering Sea” brings back one of the stars of “Sharknado,” Cassie Scerbo.

headline.seo: ‘Beast of the Bering Sea’ Stars Cassie Scerbo of ‘Sharknado’
headline.main: Striking a Rich Vein, of Sorts
